examples.text: Gerçek bir arkadaş seni asla satmaz.
examples.translation: A real friend will never betray you.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish صاتمق (satmak, “to sell, deal in, palm off, foist”). Cognate of Old Turkic [script needed] (sat-, “to sell”), Azerbaijani satmaq (“to sell”), Bashkir һатыу (hatıw, “to sell”), Chuvash сутма (sutma, “to sell”), Kazakh сату (satu, “to sell”), Khakas садарға (sadarğa, “to sell”), Kyrgyz сатуу (satuu, “to sell”), Turkmen satmak (“to sell”), Tuvan садар (sadar, “to sell”), Uzbek sotmoq (“to sell”), Yakut атыы (atïï, “commerce, trade”).
